scripts.docker-jekyll-build: cd jekyll && bundle exec jekyll build --watch
scripts.docker-restart: docker-compose stop jekyll && docker-compose start jekyll
scripts.dev:docker-init: docker-compose up -d && docker cp package.json jekyll:/src && docker exec -i jekyll yarn && docker cp Gemfile jekyll:/src &&docker exec -i jekyll bundle install && docker cp jekyll:/src/Gemfile.lock .
scripts.dev:docker: npm run sync-unison && npm run docker-restart && npm run open-preview && concurrently -k -n "SYNC,DOCKER" -c "bgRed.bold,bgCyan.bold" "npm run watch:sync" "docker exec -i jekyll npm run in-docker-dev"
scripts.in-docker-dev: concurrently -k -n "JEKYLL,BROWSER-SYNC" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run docker-jekyll-build" "browser-sync start -s jekyll/_site -f jekyll/_site --extensions html"
scripts.build: cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --trace
